name: Doug Warren
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This web site is the home page for my GitHub account (dpw67) and repositories. 

### Status and Plans
Initially I used the automatic generator to create this page using GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM). Then I will create a branch named `gh-pages` for manual updates. Later I plan to utilize Jekyll, a simple blog aware static site generator. It includes additional features such as site-wide headers and footers, as well as intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features. 

### Repositories
These are selected recent active projects:
* [dev-r-coursera](https://github.com/dpw67/dev-r-coursera) - Coursera: R Programming examples
* [nodejsinaction](https://github.com/dpw67/nodejsinaction) - Node.JS in Action, 2nd Edition examples

### About this site
* [Web site URL](https://dpw67.GitHub.io)
* [Email contact](git@dpw67.oib.com)

### Related sites
* [Wordpress](https://dpw67.wordpress.com)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/dpw67blog)
* [Facebook](https://facebook.com/dpw67blog)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
